div.head: 小便滑數
div.div: minor relief smooth and frequent; smooth and frequent urination

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief smooth and frequent; smooth and frequent urination

sense.def: Illness Sign of frequently repeated urination associated with urinary incontinence. Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry wu yao 烏藥：能補中益氣，偏止小便滑數 , “It is able to supplement the center and increase qi. It is especially capable of stopping smooth and frequent urination ”.
